name: Hyper Sensitive (Test Edition)
description:
BEST PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN

Bug: if your controls don't work click on the screen and try again

Looking for a game with 1 level and shit controls?

I made this game in under an hour because I was bored and wanted to test how fast I could make a simple platformer ;p

controls:

L & R Arrows = Left & Right

UP Arrow = Jump
